person.persName: John Ewing Halsell (County Attorney of Warren County)

body.p: Bowling Green, Kentucky, attorney, farmer, and County Attorney. Kentucky native. Son of William Halsell and Mary Garland Halsell. Attended Cumberland University in Lebanon, Tennessee. Studied law under Garland J. Blewett in Bowling Green. Married to Sarah A. Smith Halsell in 1849. Admitted to the bar in 1856. Elder of Cumberland Presbyterian Church from 1856 to c1878. Attorney in Warren County in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in Warren County in 1860. County Attorney of Warren County from c1861 to c1864.
